name: PicoClaw Reference Sync
description: Monitor sipeed/picoclaw for useful changes and selectively adopt them into tinyland-inc/picoclaw via annotated PRs.
process: Use github_fetch to check latest changes on sipeed/picoclaw main (README, go.mod, CHANGELOG)
Compare key files with tinyland-inc/picoclaw main using github_fetch
Analyze changes for relevance: provider changes, tool additions, config schema updates, Go module bumps
For worth-adopting changes: create branch reference-sync-YYYY-MM-DD on tinyland-inc/picoclaw using github_create_branch
Apply changes via github_update_file to the sync branch
Create sync PR on tinyland-inc/picoclaw targeting main with detailed analysis
For breaking changes: create tracking issue with migration notes

metrics.successCriteria: Reference project checked, changes categorized, adoption PR created if needed
